# Git Add X

![Demo](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/71459066/425668618-703dcb7b-043b-40c3-b062-a83dce9a11f8.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..LPmN7ZfvsuD9XJd1Vd1yHJfqz5Ghdb2WlZpQcXut0HQ)

### Usage: 
#### - source the gcx.sh file in .zshrc / .bashrc
#### - use _gax_ followed by a single argument
#### - grep matches (case insensitive) under the hood
#### - works with a single file or more (e.g. _gax .py_)
